    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DAOFactory getInstance()
                              throws DAOConfigurationException
        This static method return the only instance of the DAOFactory. If it has already been instanciate, it do not have to create a new one. It create an instance if and only if any one does exist.
        Returns:
        It return the unique instance of the DAOFactory.
        Throws:
        DAOConfigurationException - Which is generate when the process fail to load the Driver or read the connection data to the database.

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                  throws PoolException
        Get a connection from the current Pool instance.
        Returns:
        a connection
        Throws:
        PoolException

      • deliverConnection

        public void deliverConnection(java.sql.Connection connection)
                       throws PoolException
        This method deliver a connection to the pooling connection
        Parameters:
        connection - which should be deliver to the pooling connection.
        Throws:
        PoolException - when a connection to be deliver is not manage by the pooling.

      • closePool

        public void closePool()
               throws PoolException
        close the connections manage by the pooling connection (unique instance of Pool)
        Throws:
        PoolException - when an error occurs during the connections closing

      • getProfileDao

        public ProfileDao getProfileDao()
        Get the contract/interface/specification of the ProfileDao through is implementation.
        Returns:
        the interface of the ProfileDao
